content.question: Emmit wants to examine whether there is a difference in the number of students with an internal locus of control and the number with an external locus of control based on class year (e.g., freshmen versus sophomores). Which of the following is the most appropriate research method for Emmit to use to determine whether there is a difference?

skill.text: 2.C: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in non-experimental methodologies.
